tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE artist_profile (
  artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  biography TEXT,
  portfolio TEXT,
  exhibition_history TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE exhibitions (
    exhibition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id INT REFERENCES artist_profiles(artist_id),
    exhibition_date TIMESTAMP,
    location TEXT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE artist_profiles (
  artist_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  biography TEXT,
  birth_date DATE,
  nationality VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE portfolios (
  portfolio_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_id INT REFERENCES artist_profiles(artist_id),
  title VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  date_created DATE
);

CREATE TABLE exhibition_history (
  exhibition_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_id INT REFERENCES artist_profiles(artist_id),
  exhibition_name VARCHAR(255),
  exhibition_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Portfolio (
    portfolio_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id INT REFERENCES ArtistProfile(artist_id),
    artwork_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    creation_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ExhibitionHistory (
    exhibition_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id INT REFERENCES ArtistProfile(artist_id),
    exhibition_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    exhibition_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Artwork (
    artwork_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id INT REFERENCES ArtistProfile(artist_id),
    artwork_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    creation_date DATE,
    medium VARCHAR(50),
    style VARCHAR(50)
);
